entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 08:00 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: E 40 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
